thread.title: Tekken 8 producer has promised to fix all the fighting game's problems that were discovered in the demo | Gagadget.com
thread.title_full: Tekken 8 producer has promised to fix all the fighting game's problems that were discovered in the demo | Gagadget.com

author: Anton Kratiuk
title: Tekken 8 producer has promised to fix all the fighting game's problems that were discovered in the demo | Gagadget.com
text:
In December, gamers got the opportunity to get acquainted with the demo of Tekken 8 fighting game.
Fans of the universe with pleasure joined the familiarisation with the new part of Tekken and were generally satisfied with the work done by Bandai Namco.
Here's What We Know Of course, not without remarks. Users found a number of problems that need to be fixed before the release of the game.
Tekken producer Katsuhiro Harada thanked gamers for the critical feedback and assured that the company will certainly listen to them and in the remaining time before the release to fix everything that can.
The TEKKEN8 demo, which is now available, has attracted very positive feedback and preorders are steadily increasing. Thank you all for your support.
And we will be fixing the problems found in the demo version in the full product version. Please wait for a while for the release.
- Katsuhiro Harada (@Harada_TEKKEN) January 5, 2024
When We Can Expect It Tekken 8 will be released on 26 January 2024. The fighting game will be released on MS, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series.
Bandai Namco has unveiled the Bandai Namco has unveiled the system requirements for Tekken 8 fighting game .
Source: @Harada_TEKKEN
PC Bandai Namco multiplatform games
